# formUnion(with:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the receiver so it contains all characters that exist in either the receiver or another set.

## Declaration

```swift
func formUnion(with otherSet: CharacterSet)
```

## Combining Character Sets

- **formIntersection(with:)**: Modifies the receiver so it contains only characters that exist in both the receiver and another set.
